name: The Path Scanner: Pan & move
description:
Gameplay/Intro :-
It is a free fast paced endless running game. The objective of this game is simple: Hold your finger on the screen and try to stay on the path as long as you can.

All you need is to drag your finger on the screen to move the ball either to the left or to the right and stay in the line !! But there is a twist in the tail : If you lift you finger during the game, you will lose.

How to Play :-

1. Touch inside the magenta box that says “Pan here to move..”.
2. Keep your finger on the screen and drag to the left or right to move.
3. The dot (ball) will move with your finger as you drag it on the screen.
4. Keep the ball inside the boundary line without lifting your finger or your game gets over.


Features include :-

1) Simple UI
2) Addictive gameplay. Simple to learn but hard to play
3) Cool music and sound effects
4) View your current and high score anytime
5) Nice animation
6) No IAP, universal game and awesome gameplay!

Try it yourself!
